content: got a kiddo with a wiggly tooth and big dreams of a visit from the tooth fairy this crochet tooth fairy pillow pattern is the perfect little project to make the moment extra special and magical it s super easy works up in just an hour or two and makes the sweetest keepsake for kids who are eagerly waiting to trade a tooth for treasure **materials** ▢red heart - white yarn ▢red heart - yellow yarn ▢red heart - orchid yarn ▢red heart - light blue yarn ▢polyfill ▢10 mm safety eyes ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
